rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg001
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi, I found something
interesting in that shop over there.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg002
rows.name: Interesting?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg003
rows.name: Yes, here it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg004
rows.name:
What is that? It looks
quite grotesque...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg005
rows.name: Isn't that an Avaritia Monkfish?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg006
rows.name: You're familiar with this, Meleph-sama?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg007
rows.name:
It's a high-class ingredient
that can only be caught around
here. It has a good flavor.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg008
rows.name: People eat this monstrous fish?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg009
rows.name:
Its appearance is questionable,
but I hear it's really delicious.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg010
rows.name:
Since we have this opportunity, I'd
like to cook something with it, but
I don't know how to prepare it...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg011
rows.name:
Meleph-san, if you know how to
prepare it, would you teach me?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg231
rows.name: How should I answer...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg012
rows.name: I'm not very good at cooking...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg013
rows.name: ...Leave it to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg101
rows.name:
It's alright. I'll handle
the troublesome parts.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg102
rows.name:
Meleph-san, I'd just need you
to explain the cooking method
and handle the seasoning.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg103
rows.name:
If that's all, then
perhaps... I can manage.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg104
rows.name:
Are you sure, Meleph-sama? Can
you really handle the seasoning?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg105
rows.name:
D-don't worry. My taste
buds are quite reliable...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg106
rows.name:
So, could you first explain
how to prepare it...?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg107
rows.name:
...I see. While it's commonly
grilled or served raw, I hear it's
absolutely delicious in a stew.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg108
rows.name:
That sounds great... Then,
Meleph-san, could you prepare
the broth for the stew?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg109
rows.name:
Understood. If I recall correctly,
the stock is made from the liver.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg110
rows.name:
Then I think I can leave
that part to you. I'll go
get the other ingredients.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg111
rows.name: ...Got it.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg113
rows.name: ...Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg114
rows.name: Yes, what is it?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg115
rows.name:
Do we have to start by cutting
up thisnevolting fish?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg116
rows.name: Well, yes. Can you do it?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg117
rows.name:
No... To begin with, I don't even
know which part is the liver.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg118
rows.name:
Anyway, let's try cutting
it open with a knife.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg119
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg120
rows.name: ...Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg121
rows.name: What is it this time?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg122
rows.name:
The heart... The heart
is still beating!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg123
rows.name:
What should I do? Should
I finish it off?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg124
rows.name:
Y-yes, probably. We wouldn't
want it to fight back.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg125
rows.name: Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg126
rows.name:
Its eyes are watching me! Its
mouth is moving like it's
trying to say something...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg127
rows.name:
Surely it's resenting me
for taking its heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg128
rows.name:
It's no good... I cannot whip
the dead any further...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg129
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, I'll leave the rest to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg130
rows.name:
Wait just a minute! You
can't just dump this on me!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg131
rows.name: I'm sorry!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg132
rows.name:
Meleph-sama! Fleeing before the
enemy is a grave offense!!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg201
rows.name:
Um, Meleph-sama, are you
really sure about this?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg202
rows.name: Ah, don't worry.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg203
rows.name: So, shall we begin by gutting the fish?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg204
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg205
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg206
rows.name: ...Gut it? This thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg207
rows.name:
That's right. We can't
cook it as it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg208
rows.name:
...Fine. Everything is a challenge
to be faced. Let's do this.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg209
rows.name: You can do it, Meleph-sama!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg211
rows.name: ...Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg212
rows.name: Yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg213
rows.name: Hold down this thing's head.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg214
rows.name:
What?! No, I'd rather
not... touch it...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg215
rows.name:
It's hard to make the cut
when it's staring at me.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg216
rows.name: I understand, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg217
rows.name:
I'm begging you! Please
cover its eyes for me!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg218
rows.name:
Very well. I cannot allow myself
to be defeated by a mere fish!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg219
rows.name: Kyaaaaaaaaa!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg220
rows.name: What's wrong?!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg221
rows.name:
Its eyesâ€”it looked at me!
Could it still be alive?!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg222
rows.name:
Impossible!? Then I'll finish
it off before it attacks!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg223
rows.name: It's opening its mouth!?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg224
rows.name:
Meleph-sama, the enemy intends to
eat us! Quickly, finish it off!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg225
rows.name: Here I go, Blue Flame Sword!

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg226
rows.name:
Wait a minute! If you do that,
the ingredients will...

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg227
rows.name: ...Well, Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg228
rows.name:
As expected of Meleph-sama. The
enemy has vanished without a trace.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg229
rows.name: Hmph, mission accomplished.

rows.label: kizunatalk002_msg230
rows.name:
What are you doing! There's
nothing left to eat!!
